title: LAG?
body: my ping doesn't go up, it just randomly says; " attempting to reconnect ". i know its not my wifi because nothing else laggs... is anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: It sounds like your network is failing to connect to the server, so a ping won't really get established until a connection is made.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) issue to make sure your network and settings are strengthened and adjusted.  This should get you back in-game!
thank you so much it's fixed. also im extremely sorry for spamming my post yesterday. it didnt say it was posted... :/ it just kept freezing.. so thank you so much for the help again â™¥
